answerText: Donatien Alphonse Francois, Marquis de Sade[10] This author wrote a play about the Marquis de Sade, who directs a performance of The Persecution and Assassination of Jean-Paul Marat as performed by the inmates of Charenton.

question: Question: One of this author's novels concerns a woman who is used as a sex slave by French monks. That character is later sexually abused by pretty much everyone before she is struck by lightning and dies. [10] Name this author of Justine.
